name: Handtracking Physics Playerground
description:
This is the first iteration of an open-sourced, hand-tracking interaction framework for Oculus-Quest developed by Spatial Cinematics, Inc. See the source code here: https://github.com/Spatial-Cinematics/Handtracking-Physics

This project is part of a study meant for testing hand-tracking physics! There's a voluntary in app questionnaire that asks a few quick question about how you're enjoying the physics based hand tracking.
